metadata.title: CVE-2024-1085 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel's netfilter: nf_tablescomponent can be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation.The nft_setelem_catchall_deactivate() function checks whether the catch-allset element is active in the current generation instead of the nextgeneration before freeing it, but only flags it inactive in the nextgeneration, making it possible to free the element multiple times, leadingto a double free vulnerability.We recommend upgrading past commitb1db244ffd041a49ecc9618e8feb6b5c1afcdaa7.

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
